member.name: T:BomberStuff.Core.ErrorHandling
member.summary: Centralized methods for displaying and handling errors in the program

member.name: M:BomberStuff.Core.ErrorHandling.FatalError(System.Exception,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Handle an expected, but fatal error. Outputs a user-readable message an may or may not terminate the program.
member.param: an exception related to the error, or null

member.name: M:BomberStuff.Core.ErrorHandling.UnexpectedError(System.Exception,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Handle an unexpected fatal error. Outputs a user-readable message and may prompt the user to report the error. May or may not terminate the program.
member.param: an exception related to the error, or null

member.name: M:BomberStuff.Core.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Program entry. Handles command line arguments and loads plugins accordingly
